text: @jeffmason1 @digby56 @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Q - if they have had Covid-19 and just recovered why are they social distancing? This would have been the perfect place to show that antibodies can return us back to the way thing were. Unless maybe there is enough evidence that is either not known or not true.
